title: Account Organization
description: Commonly used organizational attributes for a B2B account such as number of employees, market segment, industry, rating, tickersymbol etc.

organizationType.title: Type of Organizations
organizationType.description: Label describing the type of organization.

numberOfEmployees.title: Number of employees
numberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees of the account.

annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
annualRevenue.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account.

website.title: Website URL
website.description: The URL of the account's website.

rating.title: Rating
rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this account. `1` indicates the maximum possible rating, `0` the minimum possible rating.

tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
tickerSymbol.description: The stock market symbol for this account.

logoUrl.title: Logo URL
logoUrl.description: URL for the image of the account's logo.

linkedinPageUrl.title: Linkedinin Page URL
linkedinPageUrl.description: The URL of the account's LinkedIn page.

twitterHandleUrl.title: Twitter handle URL
twitterHandleUrl.description: The URL of the account's Twitter profile.

facebookPageUrl.title: Facebook Page URL
facebookPageUrl.description: The URL of the account's Facebook page.

NAICSCode.title: NAICS Code
NAICSCode.description: The code for the account's industry within the North American Industry Classification System.

SICCode.title: SIC Code
SICCode.description: The code for the account's industry within the Standard Industrial Classification system.

NAICSDescription.title: NAICS Description
NAICSDescription.description: The description for the account's industry based on its NAICS code.

SICDescription.title: SIC Description
SICDescription.description: The description for the account's industry based on its SIC code.

DUNSNumber.title: Dun & Bradstreet D-U-N-S Number
DUNSNumber.description: The number for the account in the Dun & Bradstreet database.

jigsaw.title: Jigsaw
jigsaw.description: The key for the account in Data.com.

primaryEmailDomain.title: Primary Email Domain
primaryEmailDomain.description: The primary domain of email addresses associated with the account.

companyProductAndServices.title: Company Product and Services
companyProductAndServices.description: Description of the account's product and/or services.
